derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: back-formation from fountain, on the pattern of the pair mountain, mount

entry.def: If you describe a person or thing as the fount of something, you are saying that they are an important source or supply of it.

example.ex: To the young boy his father was the fount of all knowledge.
example.tran: 对于这个小男孩儿来说，他的父亲就是所有知识的源泉。

means.word_mean: 1. a specific size and style of type within a type family
2. a plumbing fixture that provides a flow of water
